languages.text: "Я рад{mf||а} видеть тебя сейчас, буду рад{mf||а} и на смертном одре".
"I am happy to see you now, and I will be happy to see you on my deathbed."
languages.original_text: "Я рад{mf||а} видеть тебя сейчас, буду рад{mf||а} и на смертном одре".

traits.locale_text: "I'm happy to see you now, and I will be happy to see you on my deathbed."
"I'm happy to see you now, and I will be happy to see you on my deathbed."
"I am happy to see you now, and I will be happy to see you on my deathbed."
"I am happy to see you now, and I will be happy to see you on my deathbed."
"I am happy to see you now, and I will be happy to see you on my deathbed."

languages.text: “我和愿意有你相伴，直至临终的那一天。”
languages.original_text: "I am happy to see you now, and I will be happy to see you on my deathbed."

traits.locale_text: “我和愿意有你相伴，直至临终的那一天。”

languages.text: «Me alegro de verte ahora y me alegraré de verte en mi lecho de muerte».
languages.original_text: "I am happy to see you now, and I will be happy to see you on my deathbed."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro de verte ahora y me alegraré de verte en mi lecho de muerte».

languages.text: « Je suis {mf|heureux|heureuse} de vous voir maintenant, et je serai aussi {mf|heureux|heureuse} de vous voir quand je serai sur mon lit de mort. »
languages.original_text: "I am happy to see you now, and I will be happy to see you on my deathbed."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis {mf|heureux|heureuse} de vous voir maintenant, et je serai aussi {mf|heureux|heureuse} de vous voir quand je serai sur mon lit de mort. »

languages.text: "Ich freue mich, Euch jetzt zu sehen, und das wird auf meinem Totenbett nicht anders sein."
languages.original_text: "I am happy to see you now, and I will be happy to see you on my deathbed."

traits.locale_text: "Ich freue mich, Euch jetzt zu sehen, und das wird auf meinem Totenbett nicht anders sein."

languages.text: 「今ここでお前に会えて幸せだ。死の床でも会えたなら嬉しく思う」
languages.original_text: "I am happy to see you now, and I will be happy to see you on my deathbed."

traits.locale_text: 「今ここでお前に会えて幸せだ。死の床でも会えたなら嬉しく思う」

languages.text: "Seni her gördüğümde seviniyorum, ölüm döşeğinde de olsam sevineceğim."
languages.original_text: "I am happy to see you now, and I will be happy to see you on my deathbed."

traits.locale_text: "Seni her gördüğümde seviniyorum, ölüm döşeğinde de olsam sevineceğim."
